summary: Foreigner, a rock band from New York, has sold over 80 million records worldwide. Founded in 1976 by British and American musicians, their name reflects this mix. They've had huge hits like "I Want to Know What Love Is" and "Hot Blooded." The band's debut album, *Foreigner*, and its follow-ups were massive successes, with multiple top-charting singles. Over the years, the lineup changed, but they continued to release albums. Despite some lineup changes and breaks, Foreigner's impact is undeniable, leading to their 2024 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame induction.
title: Foreigner (band)
